name.zh: PlayStation Network 充值卡（PSN）马来西亚

description.en:
About PSN Cards

PlayStation Network Cards are the perfect way to add funds to your PSN wallet. Use them to purchase games, DLCs, movies, and more from the PlayStation Store.

What You Can Buy

  • Full games and indie titles
  • Game add-ons and season passes
  • PlayStation Plus subscriptions
  • Movies and TV shows
  • Avatars and themes

Compatible with PS5, PS4, PS3, and PS Vita.
description.zh:
关于 PSN 充值卡

PlayStation Network 充值卡是为您的 PSN 钱包添加资金的完美方式。使用它们可以从 PlayStation Store 购买游戏、DLC、电影等。

您可以购买什么

  • 完整游戏和独立游戏
  • 游戏附加内容和季票
  • PlayStation Plus 会员
  • 电影和电视节目
  • 头像和主题

兼容 PS5、PS4、PS3 和 PS Vita。

shortDescription.en: Add funds to your PlayStation wallet. Buy games, DLCs, and subscriptions instantly.
shortDescription.zh: 为您的 PlayStation 钱包充值。立即购买游戏、DLC 和订阅。

supportedGames: The Last of Us Part II

usageGuide.en:
1. Sign in to PlayStation Network
  2. Go to PlayStation Store
  3. Select your avatar at the top of the screen
  4. Select Redeem Codes
  5. Enter your 12-digit code and select Continue
  6. Funds will be added to your wallet immediately

Note: Codes are region-locked to Malaysian accounts only.
usageGuide.zh:
1. 登录 PlayStation Network
  2. 进入 PlayStation Store
  3. 选择屏幕顶部的头像
  4. 选择兑换代码
  5. 输入您的 12 位代码并选择继续
  6. 资金将立即添加到您的钱包

注意：代码仅限马来西亚账户使用。
